title: Help on how to beat Garen as Wukong
body: Recently, I started playing Wukong. I was up against Garen so I thought I needed sustain and bought corrupting potion. However I lost lane 0-4 with even with help from my jungler. Every time I used my clone he wouldn't use his Q (probably because he knew) or any abilities. How can a wukong player beat an experienced garen?

replies.body: The advice I would offer is just spend time farming passively, if Garen wastes a skill prematurely try to punish him, don't die because  that will only tilt you further. Don't let him ambush you from bushes.
